name: John BERRY, Petitioner v. Pamela Pryor DEMBE, Respondent

parties: John BERRY, Petitioner v. Pamela Pryor DEMBE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of August, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
26 A.3d 473
John BERRY, Petitioner v. Pamela Pryor DEMBE, Respondent.
No. 6 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 1, 2011.
